text: United Nations Security Council resolution 1253, adopted without a vote on 28 July 1999, after examining the application of the Kingdom of Tonga for membership in the United Nations, the Council recommended to the General Assembly that Tonga be admitted, bringing total membership of the United Nations to 188. ==See also== * Enlargement of the United Nations * List of United Nations member states * List of United Nations Security Council Resolutions 1201 to 1300 (1998–2000) == References == ==External links== * *Text of the Resolution at undocs.org 1253 1253 1253 Category:1999 in Tonga Category:July 1999 events
title: United Nations Security Council Resolution 1253
